title: Churchwardens: A Survival Guide : The Office and Role of Chruchwardens for the 21st Century
description: Churchwardens: A Survival Guide is a practical guide to understanding the responsibilities and potential problems of being a church warden. With case histories and checklists, the book is designed to relate closely to real-life situations. Relevant legal information is also included as a reference resource.
author: Martin Dudley
